channel.title: App on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in App on Deuts Log

item.title: dupeGuru | finds duplicate files
item.description:
dupeGuru | finds duplicate files

dupeGuru is a cross-platform (Linux, OS X, Windows) GUI tool to find duplicate files in a system. It’s written mostly in Python 3 and has the peculiarity of using multiple GUI toolkits, all using the same core Python code. On OS X, the UI layer is written in Objective-C and uses Cocoa. On Linux & Windows, it’s written in Python and uses Qt5.
item.content:encoded:
dupeGuru | finds duplicate files

dupeGuru is a cross-platform (Linux, OS X, Windows) GUI tool to find duplicate files in a system. It’s written mostly in Python 3 and has the peculiarity of using multiple GUI toolkits, all using the same core Python code. On OS X, the UI layer is written in Objective-C and uses Cocoa. On Linux & Windows, it’s written in Python and uses Qt5.

item.title: Super Productivity - Todo List with Time Tracker app
item.description:
Super Productivity - Todo List with Time Tracker app

Efficiently manage your tasks and track the time spent on each one. Utilize timeboxing to maintain focus and prevent getting overwhelmed. Effortlessly generate timesheets and work summaries for comprehensive work documentation.
item.content:encoded:
Super Productivity - Todo List with Time Tracker app
